item.title: Dialogue Help 317 Delta
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

There are 5 dialogue boxes i want to open up when the player logs on for the first time. Such as:

case 1: talk("Hello " + playerName + ", and welcome to SincereScape!", 0); break; case 2: talk("The owner is Joseph.", 0); break; case 3: talk("Ask players,mods and admins for help or type ::help.", 0); break; case 4: talk("You will be given a starter to.. well start off.", 0); break; case 5: talk("Enjoy!", 0); break;

But when i log “case 5:” gets stuck on “please wait…” after i click “click here to continue”
Does anyone know how to fix it so after i click “click here to continue” it automatically closes the dialogue box?

Read full topic
